title: WTF are Militaries Using AI For and Why Defense Budgets Are FOMOing Worldwide
preview_text:
Every major technology eventually passes through the same gateway.
It starts in research labs.
It gets commercial hype.
And then it lands in defense budgets.
The internet did. GPS did. Satellites did.
